nodes.documentation:
@title A registrar that allocates subdomains to their DNS owners.
@author Jonah Groendal
nodes.name: DNSRegistrar
register
isDomainOwner

nodes.documentation:
@param certId The keccack256 hash of a certificate's DER-encoded public key
@return True iff the certificate is valid
nodes.name: isValidCert

nodes.documentation:
@dev Add a trusted root cert (from a trustworthy certificate authority)
@param certId The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key
nodes.name: addTrustAnchor

nodes.documentation:
@dev Remove a trusted root cert
@param certId The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key
nodes.name: removeTrustAnchor

nodes.documentation:
@title A registrar that allocates subdomains to their DNS owners.
@author Jonah Groendal
nodes.name: DNSRegistrar
register
isDomainOwner

nodes.documentation:
@param certId The keccack256 hash of a certificate's DER-encoded public key
@return True iff the certificate is valid
nodes.name: isValidCert

nodes.documentation:
@dev Add a trusted root cert (from a trustworthy certificate authority)
@param certId The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key
nodes.name: addTrustAnchor

nodes.documentation:
@dev Remove a trusted root cert
@param certId The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key
nodes.name: removeTrustAnchor

devdoc.author: Jonah Groendal

addTrustAnchor(bytes32).details: Add a trusted root cert (from a trustworthy certificate authority)

params.certId: The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key

params._ens: The address of the ENS registry.
params._maxCertAge: The max age a valid leaf cert is allowed to be.
params._minNumCerts: The min number of certificate authorities.
params._rootNode: The node that this registrar administers.
params._x509: The address of X509ForestOfTrust, a data structre of validated certs.

params.account: The address that we are verifying is the domain owner.
params.node: The ENS namehash of the domain in question. (i.e. namehash("domain.tld"))

isDomainOwner(bytes32,address).return: True iff enough certificates for this domain are owned by `account`         and none are owned by any other non-zero address.

register(bytes32,bytes32,address).details: Register a web2 domain that you have proven ownership of in X509ForestOfTrust.

params.domain: The hash of the second-level label of the domain (e.g. "wikipedia")
params.owner: The address of the new owner.
params.tld: The hash of the top-level label of the domain (e.g. "org").

params.certId: The keccak256 hash of the cert's public key

devdoc.title: A registrar that allocates subdomains to their DNS owners.
